recipe.title: Thai Fried Rice
recipe.instructions: 1. Saute garlic in oil. Add sliced pork; cook until brown. Add onion, tomato, and green pepper; fry slightly. Cook rice in water; add to fried mixture. Add eggs and fry. Continue stirring until eggs are cooked. Add soy sauce, salt, sugar, and pepper. Yields 6-8 servings.
